main.controllers

Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controllers.MessageController

  • public class MessageController
extends java.lang.Object
    The MessageController handles different types of users' sending messages features, and could also gives that who could the user message.
    Since:
    2020-11-12
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ruoming Ren
